```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
```

```{r is_blank_plot, cache = TRUE}

GGally:::is_blank_plot(ggally_blank())
 GGally:::is_blank_plot(ggally_points(mtcars, ggplot2::aes_string(x = "disp", y = "hp")))



```
